about_the_game:
The world is getting into a dark era, you must be the hero that save it.

Action rpg that containst fast-Paced combat and survival elements. Use your skills to defeat the Undead.

Try to find equiment and kill the enemies that are close. Find a way to escape the island.



Features different gameplay options.

-Fight the enemies and try to survive as much possible.

-Use different kind of weaponry and magic.

-Find hidden items across maps.
detailed_description:
The world is getting into a dark era, you must be the hero that save it.

Action rpg that containst fast-Paced combat and survival elements. Use your skills to defeat the Undead.

Try to find equiment and kill the enemies that are close. Find a way to escape the island.



Features different gameplay options.

-Fight the enemies and try to survive as much possible.

-Use different kind of weaponry and magic.

-Find hidden items across maps.
name: Undead World Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP (SP3) or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo (Merom) 1.66GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Graphics Media Accelerator 950 or equivalent
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Dolby Sorround
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 a 2.4 GHz o equivalente
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon X800 / NVIDIA GeForce 7600 / Intel HD Graphics 2000 or higher
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Soundcard compatible with DirectX 9.0c

short_description: Action rpg that containst fast-Paced combat and survival elements. Use your skills to defeat the Undead.
